hero.title: Staying Beautiful
hero.subtitle: BEAUTY SERVICES, SIMPLIFIED!
hero.description: Book trusted beauty professionals in your area with ease. From hair styling to skincare, find the perfect provider for your needs.

features.trustedDesc: All professionals are verified and rated by real clients
features.convenientDesc: Book appointments online 24/7 with instant confirmation
features.secureDesc: Safe and secure payment processing with multiple options

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Book your perfect beauty service in three simple steps
howItWorks.step1Desc: Browse verified providers in your area. Filter by service type, price, availability, and reviews to find your perfect match.
howItWorks.step2Desc: View real-time availability and book your appointment instantly. Choose your preferred date, time, and specific services with transparent pricing.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Relax and enjoy your beauty service. Pay securely through the app and leave a review to help others discover amazing providers.

featuredProviders.title: Featured Beauty Providers
featuredProviders.description: Discover top-rated providers in your area, verified and ready to transform your look.

services.title: Explore Beauty Services
services.description: Find providers for every beauty need

safety.title: Your Safety is Our Priority
safety.description: We verify every professional and ensure secure transactions
safety.verifiedDesc: All professionals undergo background checks and skill verification before joining our platform.
safety.secureDesc: Your payment information is protected with bank-level encryption and fraud protection.
safety.supportDesc: Our customer support team is available around the clock to help resolve any issues.

professional.title: Are You a Beauty Professional?
professional.description: Join thousands of beauty professionals who have grown their business with Byootify. Get more clients, manage bookings effortlessly, and build your reputation.
